title: The Hardest Part About Racing Unbound Might Just Be Finding an Affordable Place to Sleep
content:
Unbound Gravel temporarily increases the population of Emporia, Kansas by 50%. Housing costs during race week continue to rise, leading to a wide range of lodging solutions from riders.

Read the full article at The Hardest Part About Racing Unbound Might Just Be Finding an Affordable Place to Sleep on Velo.
author: Will Tracy
